thread.title: Victory Living Programs Combines Fun and Fundraising at Annual "Queen Witch for the Day" Luncheon
thread.title_full: Victory Living Programs Combines Fun and Fundraising at Annual "Queen Witch for the Day" Luncheon - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Victory Living Programs Combines Fun and Fundraising at Annual "Queen Witch for the Day" Luncheon
text:
Victory Living Programs
FT. LAUDERDALE, Fla. , Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Costumes, champagne, a gourmet lunch, and a lot of laughs is what the annual " Queen Witch for the Day " event is all about. Victory Living Programs (VLP), a nonprofit organization that helps individuals with disabilities live a more independent life, will host its annual "Queen Witch for the Day" luncheon on Wednesday, October 28 . All are invited for an afternoon of costumed fun and lots of food, which will culminate in the crowning of the "2015 Queen Witch for the Day."
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151009/275698
This year's "Queen Witch for the Day" champagne luncheon will be held at the Fort Lauderdale Country Club (415 Country Club Circle, Plantation FL 33317) from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. For the 3 rd year, Akerman LLP is sponsoring the event.
"Our annual luncheon aims to combine laughter, an essential part of life, and giving back," said Bobbi Wigand , Executive Director of Victory Living Programs. "Each year, everyone in attendance has such a great time with the theme, so we can't wait to see what clever costumes attendees will come up with this year."
The afternoon of festivities will include a three-course lunch, champagne, courtesy of Premier Beverage, a table-decorating contest, and the "Queen Witch for the Day" pageant, with MC Amber from LIPS and judged by a panel of celebrity judges who will crown the 2015 "Queen Witch for the Day." All guests are encouraged to come dressed in their best witch-themed costume and compete for the "Queen Witch for the Day" title.
Proceeds from the event will contribute to Victory Living's year-round programs such as the supported living program, adult day training program, supported employment program and the social and recreational program.
Tickets to the "Queen Witch for the Day" luncheon are $65 per person or $480 for a table of eight. Tickets can be purchased HERE.
For more information about VLP and the programs they offer, please visit www.victoryliving.org or call (954) 616-1074.
About Victory Living Programs
For the past four decades, Victory Living Programs has created supportive environments for thousands of people with disabilities. Based in warm, beautiful Ft. Lauderdale, Florida , Victory Living Programs offers a premier supported living program that places clients in their own individual, luxurious apartments. In addition, Victory Living Programs also offers an extensive array of programming to assist clients with securing and maintaining employment, learning new skills, volunteering in the community and socializing with their peers - all of which make it possible to infuse independence and transform the lives of people with disabilities. To learn more, visit www.victoryliving.org .
Contact: Laurie Menekou , (954) 732-0754 (or) lmenekou@conceptual-communications.com
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/victory-living-programs-combines-fun-and-fundraising-at-annual-queen-witch-for-the-day-luncheon-300157314.html
